name: Twin Disciplines
text: Give an ally +3|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
flavor_text: "Never fear change. It will question you, test your limits. It is our greatest teacher." - Karma

name: Yasuo
text: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
flavor_text: "Death is like the wind..."

name: Keeper of Masks
text: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
flavor_text: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."

name: Herald of Spring
text: Support: Give my supported ally Lifesteal this round.
flavor_text:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem

name: Fae Bladetwirler
text: When you Stun or Recall a unit, grant me +2|+0.
flavor_text: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"

name: Kinkou Lifeblade
flavor_text: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."

name: Karma
text: Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
flavor_text: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."

name: Recall
text: Recall an ally.
flavor_text: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.

name: Zed
text: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats.
flavor_text: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."

name: Greenglade Elder
text: When I'm summoned, grant allies in hand +1|+1.
flavor_text: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.

name: Nimble Poro
flavor_text: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand

name: Navori Conspirator
text: To play me, Recall an ally.
flavor_text: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."

name: Jeweled Protector
text: Play: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
flavor_text:
"In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle."
- Saga of the First Lands

name: Sown Seeds
text: Grant allies in hand +1|+0.
flavor_text: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma

name: Death Mark
text: Remove Ephemeral from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
flavor_text: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed

name: Shadow Flare
text: Grant ALL battling followers Ephemeral.
flavor_text: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.

name: Inspiring Mentor
text: Play: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
flavor_text: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”

name: Dawn and Dusk
text: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're Ephemeral.
flavor_text: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed

name: Scaled Snapper
text: Play: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
flavor_text: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

name: Shadow Assassin
text: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavor_text:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.

name: Shen
text: Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
flavor_text: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."

name: Shadow Fiend
flavor_text: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed

name: Rush
text: Give an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
flavor_text: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.

name: Yone, Windchaser
text: Play: Stun 2 enemies.
flavor_text: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."

name: Zephyr Sage
text: Play: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than Zephyr Sage.
flavor_text:
"As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'"
- Saga of the First Lands

name: Greenglade Lookout
text: Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in hand by 1.
flavor_text: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."

name: Minah Swiftfoot
text: Play: Recall 3 enemies.
flavor_text: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand

name: Ritual of Renewal
text: Heal an ally or your Nexus 4. Draw 1.
flavor_text: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma

name: Stand United
text: Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
flavor_text: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

name: Ghost
text: Give an ally Elusive this round.
flavor_text: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed

name: Windfarer Hatchling
text: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
flavor_text:
"Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes."
- Saga of the First Lands

name: Insight of Ages
text:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
flavor_text: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

name: Silent Shadowseer
text: Nexus Strike: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavor_text: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."

name: Cloud Drinker
text: Your Burst and Focus spells cost 1 less.
flavor_text: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.

name: Will of Ionia
text: Recall a unit.
flavor_text: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.

name: Navori Bladescout
text: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
flavor_text: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"

name: Sparring Student
text: When you summon another ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
flavor_text: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"

name: Greenglade Duo
text: When you summon another ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavor_text:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"

name: Kinkou Wayfinder
text: Allegiance: Summon a 1 cost ally from your deck.
flavor_text: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.

name: Yusari
flavor_text: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."

name: Ren Shadowblade
text: Strike: Create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
flavor_text: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”

name: Emerald Awakener
text: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavor_text: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."

name: Health Potion
text: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavor_text: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.

name: Deny
text: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
flavor_text: No.

name: Navori Highwayman
text: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand with my stats.
flavor_text: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”

name: The Empyrean
flavor_text: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General

name: Greenglade Caretaker
text: When an ally gets Barrier, grant me +2|+0.
flavor_text: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."

name: Steel Tempest
text: Stun an attacking enemy.
flavor_text: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo

name: Spirit's Refuge
text: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
flavor_text: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen

name: Rivershaper
text: Strike: Draw a spell.
flavor_text: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."

name: Solitary Monk
text: Play: Recall all other allies.
flavor_text: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."

name: Shadowshift
text: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavor_text: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

name: Ki Guardian
text:
Grant Barrier to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
flavor_text: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen

name: Draven
text: When I'm summoned or strike: Create a Spinning Axe in hand.
flavor_text: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."

name: Vladimir
text: Play: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
flavor_text:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...

name: Culling Strike
text: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
flavor_text: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.

name: Crimson Curator
text: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in hand.
flavor_text: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"

name: Darius
flavor_text: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain

name: Arachnoid Host
text: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
flavor_text: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.

name: Decisive Maneuver
text: Stun an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
flavor_text: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Swain

name: Arachnoid Sentry
text: Play: Stun an enemy.
flavor_text: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat

name: Transfusion
text: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
flavor_text: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

name: Legion Saboteur
text: Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Swain

name: Brothers' Bond
text: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
flavor_text: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran

name: House Spider
text: When I'm summoned, summon a Spiderling.
flavor_text: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise

name: Crimson Disciple
text: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"

name: Arena Battlecaster
text: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
flavor_text: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.

name: Legion Marauder
text: Attack: Grant allied Legion Marauders everywhere +1|+1.
flavor_text: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.

name: Crowd Favorite
text: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
flavor_text: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.

name: Whirling Death
text: A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
flavor_text: "I have the best job." - Draven

name: Reckoning
text: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
flavor_text: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster

name: Intimidating Roar
text: Stun all enemies with 4 or less Power.
flavor_text: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster

name: Legion Veteran
text: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
flavor_text: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.

name: Shiraza the Blade
text: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
flavor_text: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."

name: Katarina
text: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
flavor_text: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."

name: Captain Farron
text: When I'm summoned, create 2 Decimates in hand.
flavor_text: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.

name: Legion Rearguard
flavor_text: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.

name: Blade's Edge
text: Deal 1 to anything.
flavor_text: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina

name: Legion Grenadier
text: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.

name: Legion General
text: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've Stunned or Recalled this game.
flavor_text: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.

name: Legion Drummer
text: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack this round.
flavor_text: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.

name: Arena Bookie
text: Round Start: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
flavor_text: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."

name: Vision
text: When played or discarded, grant allies +1|+0.
flavor_text: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain

name: Trifarian Shieldbreaker
flavor_text: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius

name: Minotaur Reckoner
text: Round Start: Stun the weakest enemy.
flavor_text: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."

name: Battering Ram
text: Attack: Grant me +4|+0.
flavor_text:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."

name: Crimson Aristocrat
text: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +1|+0 and Overwhelm
flavor_text: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."

name: Trifarian Hopeful
text: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
flavor_text: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran

name: Might
text: Give an ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavor_text: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius

name: Precious Pet
flavor_text: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.

name: Death Lotus
text: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavor_text: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

name: Shunpo
text: Deal 2 to an enemy, then Rally.
flavor_text: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.

name: Trifarian Assessor
text: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
flavor_text: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General

name: Blood for Blood
text: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
flavor_text: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.

name: Savage Reckoner
flavor_text: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie

name: Trifarian Gloryseeker
flavor_text: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.

name: Decimate
text: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

name: Basilisk Rider
text: Allegiance: Grant me +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavor_text: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.

name: Affectionate Poro
flavor_text: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius

name: Draven's Biggest Fan
text: When I'm summoned, move Draven to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
flavor_text: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"

name: Reckless Trifarian
flavor_text: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Swain

name: Elixir of Wrath
text: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
flavor_text:
"When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist."
- Noxian axiom

name: Noxian Guillotine
text: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
flavor_text: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.

name: Crimson Awakener
text: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
flavor_text: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."

name: Kato The Arm
text: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavor_text: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."

name: Guile
text: Stun an enemy.
flavor_text: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc

name: Dawnspeakers
text: Round End: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
flavor_text: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"

name: Lucian
flavor_text: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."

name: Mobilize
text: Reduce the cost of allies in hand by 1.
flavor_text: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen

name: Lux
flavor_text: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"

name: Swiftwing Lancer
text: Last Breath: Create a random Elite in hand.
flavor_text: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen

name: Vanguard Defender
flavor_text: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."

name: Battlesmith
text: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
flavor_text: Wars are won in the forge.

name: Tianna Crownguard
text: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavor_text: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”

name: Garen
text: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavor_text: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.

name: Stand Alone
text: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
flavor_text: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.

name: Fiora
flavor_text: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."

name: Brightsteel Formation
text: When I'm summoned or Attack: Give allies Barrier this round.
flavor_text: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen

name: Relentless Pursuit
text: Rally.
flavor_text: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

name: Detain
text: An ally Captures a unit.
flavor_text: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader

name: Judgment
text: A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
flavor_text: Justice always comes full circle.

name: Laurent Duelist
text: Play: Grant Challenger to an ally in hand.
flavor_text: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign

name: Mageseeker Inciter
text: Grant me +2|+2 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavor_text: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook

name: Vanguard Bannerman
text: Allegiance: Grant other allies +1|+1.
flavor_text: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard

name: War Chefs
text: Support: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
flavor_text: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.

name: Plucky Poro
flavor_text: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant

name: Laurent Chevalier
text: Strike: Create in hand another random Challenger follower from your regions.
flavor_text: "...Good grief." - Fiora

name: Remembrance
text: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
flavor_text: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian

name: Redoubled Valor
text: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
flavor_text: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.

name: Mageseeker Conservator
text: Last Breath: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
flavor_text:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook

name: Silverwing Vanguard
text: Play: Summon an exact copy of me.
flavor_text: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.

name: Laurent Protege
flavor_text: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper

name: Succession
text: Summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
flavor_text: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.

name: Vanguard Lookout
flavor_text: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.

name: Purify
text: Silence a follower.
flavor_text:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook

name: Mageseeker Persuader
text: Grant me +1|+1 and Challenger once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavor_text: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"

name: Vanguard Squire
text: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavor_text: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire

name: Riposte
text: Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
flavor_text: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

name: Reinforcements
text: Summon 2 Dauntless Vanguards, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
flavor_text:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code

name: Radiant Guardian
text: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
flavor_text: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign

name: Laurent Bladekeeper
text: Play: Grant an ally +2|+2.
flavor_text: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."

name: Single Combat
text: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavor_text: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora

name: Prismatic Barrier
text: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavor_text: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

name: En Garde
text: Give allies Challenger this round.
flavor_text: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora

name: Vanguard Sergeant
text: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
flavor_text: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign

name: Senna, Sentinel of Light
text: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
flavor_text: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."

name: Back to Back
text: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
flavor_text:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion

name: For Demacia!
text: Give allies +3|+3 this round.
flavor_text: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant

name: Radiant Strike
text: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
flavor_text: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian

name: Brightsteel Protector
text: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavor_text: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III

name: Cithria of Cloudfield
flavor_text: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."

name: Vanguard Firstblade
text: Attack: Grant me +2|+2.
flavor_text: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.

name: Fleetfeather Tracker
text: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
flavor_text: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.

name: Vanguard Cavalry
flavor_text: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.

name: Chain Vest
text: Grant an ally Tough.
flavor_text: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.

name: Mageseeker Investigator
text: Create a Detain in hand once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavor_text: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."

name: Cithria the Bold
text: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
flavor_text: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”

name: Vanguard Redeemer
text: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
flavor_text: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"

name: Silverwing Diver
flavor_text: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.

name: Jinx
flavor_text:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"

name: Teemo
text: Nexus Strike: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavor_text: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."

name: Heimerdinger
text: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
flavor_text: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"

name: Augmented Experimenter
text: Play: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
flavor_text: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.

name: Parade Electrorig
text: Support: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
flavor_text: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.

name: Academy Prodigy
flavor_text: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.

name: Eager Apprentice
text: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
flavor_text: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.

name: Puffcap Peddler
text: When you play a spell, plant 3 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavor_text:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"

name: Corina Veraza
text: Play: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
flavor_text: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."

name: Jury-Rig
text: When played or discarded, summon a Scrap Scuttler.
flavor_text: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.

name: Rising Spell Force
text: Give an ally +4|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
flavor_text: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal

name: Boomcrew Rookie
text: Attack: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."

name: Shady Character
text: Play: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
flavor_text: "Hello, fellow Chem-Barons!"

name: Used Cask Salesman
text: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Caustic Casks.
flavor_text: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."

name: Sump Dredger
text: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
flavor_text: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.

name: Ezreal
text: Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
flavor_text: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"

name: Jae Medarda
text: When I'm targeted, draw 1.
flavor_text: Heir apparent to Piltover's prestigious Clan Medarda, Jae preferred hunting ancient artifacts over managing the family business... much to his father's chagrin.

name: Mushroom Cloud
text: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavor_text: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

name: Zaunite Urchin
text: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
flavor_text:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"

name: Back Alley Barkeep
text: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each Back Alley Barkeep you've summoned this game.
flavor_text: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."

name: Trueshot Barrage
text: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
flavor_text: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal

name: Daring Poro
flavor_text: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.

name: Counterfeit Copies
text: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
flavor_text: Imitation is the sincerest form of thievery.

name: Mystic Shot
text: Deal 2 to anything.
flavor_text: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal

name: Purrsuit of Perfection
text: If you've played 20 new cards this game, summon Catastrophe.
flavor_text: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project engineer

name: Hextech Transmogulator
text: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
flavor_text:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"

name: Midenstokke Henchmen
text: Nexus Strike: Summon an exact copy of me.
flavor_text:
"Mr. Berz, we found you asleep INSIDE the vault, covered in golden cogs and clutching the safe's broken door."
"Weren't me. Jus' some fella wot look like me."
"You're still holding the door."
"Prove it."

name: Statikk Shock
text:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
flavor_text: "And that's how we discovered arc discharge! Of course, my predecessor had hypothesized such an event, but underestimated the arc's reach. Poor fellow..." - Heimerdinger

name: Golden Crushbot
flavor_text: KILL. CRUSH. DESTROY. REPEAT.

name: Rummage
text: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
flavor_text: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx

name: Scrapdash Assembly
text: Summon 2 Scrap Scuttlers.
flavor_text: Two gentle creatures, once separated by an impassable lane of land, were finally brought together in the tepid waters of the Sump.

name: Thermogenic Beam
text:
To play, spend all your mana.
Deal that much to a unit.
flavor_text: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite experimenter

name: Astute Academic
text: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavor_text: Imagination is the spark of great invention. Yet, it is research that makes the spark a conflagration.

name: Unlicensed Innovation
text: Summon an Illegal Contraption.
flavor_text: "Their mishaps come in countless flavors: tremors from distant explosions, putrid fumes from the fissures. Soon enough, one of those fools will tear our city down." - Piltovan philanthropist

name: Sumpsnipe Scavenger
text: Allegiance: Create a Sumpworks Map in hand. It costs 0 this round.
flavor_text: The Zaunite kids soon started exploring the old mining tunnels and deeper levels of the Lanes. What a world they discovered. What friends they found.

name: Assembly Bot
text: When you play a spell, grant me +1|+1.
flavor_text: "Any simpleton can build a machine, but it takes extraordinary acumen to infuse a mechanized mind with TRUE progress! Soon enough those damned bureaucrats will come crawling back..." - Klas Henwick

name: Chempunk Shredder
text: Play: Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavor_text: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, gatekeeper

name: Eminent Benefactor
text: Play: Manifest an Epic card from your regions.
flavor_text: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."

name: Funsmith
text: All of your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavor_text: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"

name: Professor von Yipp
text: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
flavor_text: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."

name: Unstable Voltician
text: Grant me +4|+0 and Quick Attack once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavor_text: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.

name: Progress Day!
text: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
flavor_text:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

name: Plaza Guardian
text: I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
flavor_text: You have twenty seconds to comply.

name: Clump of Whumps
text: When I'm summoned, create a Mushroom Cloud in hand.
flavor_text: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler

name: Flame Chompers!
text: When I'm discarded, summon me.
flavor_text: "GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" - Jinx

name: Get Excited!
text:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
flavor_text: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

name: Flash of Brilliance
text:
Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
flavor_text: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.

name: Chump Whump
text: When I'm summoned, create 2 Mushroom Clouds in hand.
flavor_text: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler

name: Amateur Aeronaut
flavor_text: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan engineer

name: Intrepid Mariner
text: Support: Give my supported ally Elusive this round.
flavor_text: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.

name: Sumpworks Map
text: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavor_text: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger

name: Chempunk Pickpocket
text: Nexus Strike: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy deck.
flavor_text: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.

name: Caustic Cask
text: Last Breath: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
flavor_text: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite foreman

name: Anivia
text:
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
flavor_text: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."

name: Tryndamere
flavor_text: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."

name: Iceborn Legacy
text: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it everywhere +2|+2.
flavor_text: "We few are Iceborn, our bloodlines infused with the Freljord's magic. Our ancestors locked away an ancient evil, and now we few stand guard to defend against its return." - Gregor the Guardian

name: Omen Hawk
text: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavor_text: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen

name: Harsh Winds
text: Frostbite 2 enemies.
flavor_text: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

name: Braum
text: The first time I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
flavor_text:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"

name: Rimefang Wolf
text: Strike: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
flavor_text: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.

name: Avarosan Marksman
text: Play: Deal 1 to an enemy.
flavor_text: In the Freljord you can hunt, or you can starve.

name: Scarthane Steffen
text: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavor_text: "I sealed my oath to the Winter's Claw when Sejuani gave me my first scar. Every scar since has been earned in her service."

name: Lonely Poro
text: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
flavor_text: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder

name: Shatter
text: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, Frostbite it.
flavor_text: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen

name: Ashe
text: Attack: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
flavor_text: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."

name: Entreat
text: Draw a champion.
flavor_text: "Reavers approach! Sound the call and light the fires, we'll need all the help we can muster!" - Avarosan Sentry

name: Unscarred Reaver
text: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavor_text: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Scarmother Vrynna

name: Avalanche
text: Deal 2 to ALL units.
flavor_text: The soul of every avalanche is a pebble that would not stay put.

name: Yeti Yearling
text: Last Breath: Create 2 Enraged Yetis in your deck.
flavor_text: "It was so tiny and peaceful! Hard to believe it would grow up to be... well... a yeti." - Avarosan Trapper

name: Stalking Wolf
text: When I'm summoned, your opponent summons a Snow Hare.
flavor_text:
"You cannot make a wolf from a hare."
- Winter's Claw proverb

name: Avarosan Outriders
text: Allegiance: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and Overwhelm.
flavor_text: As the rows of reinforcements crested the ridge, the Outriders bowed their heads to the warmother. For with her--their Avarosa in the flesh, their queen Ashe--came the promise of peace.

name: Alpha Wildclaw
flavor_text: The power of a warhorse, the thoughtless savagery of a cat.

name: Brittle Steel
text: Frostbite an enemy with 3 or less Health.
flavor_text: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum

name: Scarmother Vrynna
text: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavor_text: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”

name: Winter's Breath
text: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then Frostbite all enemies.
flavor_text: Warmother Winter is the first and last foe faced by any who would invade the Freljord. Her bloodsworn are the merciless wind and the biting frost.

name: Avarosan Hearthguard
text: When I'm summoned, grant allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavor_text: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."

name: Poro Herder
text: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you Behold a Poro.
flavor_text: A herd needs just two things: love, and company. Anything else is just fluff.

name: Scarmaiden Reaver
flavor_text: "The weak harvest, but the strong take. The little Avarosans will learn which they are!"

name: Tarkaz the Tribeless
text: Attack: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavor_text: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere

name: Heart of the Fluft
text: Play: Combine your Poro followers into a Fluft of Poros, and grant it their stats and positive keywords.
flavor_text:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!"
"Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."

name: Wyrding Stones
text: Round Start: Get an extra mana gem this round.
flavor_text: "These ancient cairns are reminders that we are but the latest in a long line of tribes to brave these untamed lands." - Ashe

name: Icevale Archer
text: Play: Frostbite an enemy.
flavor_text: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.

name: Kindly Tavernkeeper
text: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavor_text: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"

name: She Who Wanders
text: Play: Obliterate ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
flavor_text: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer

name: Poro Snax
text: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavor_text: "They gobble 'em up, then look at you, tongues out, happy as sheared 'nuks in the thaw askin' for more! You try sayin' no." - Avarosan treatmaker

name: Battle Fury
text: Grant an ally +8|+4.
flavor_text: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

name: Warmother's Call
text: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH Round Start.
flavor_text: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.

name: Feral Mystic
text: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavor_text: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia

name: Icy Yeti
text: When I'm summoned, Frostbite enemies with 3 or less Health.
flavor_text: "AaaaaaaAAaaaAaaaaah!" - Bjerg the Wanderer

name: Bull Elnuk
flavor_text: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.

name: Pack Mentality
text: Give allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
flavor_text: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.

name: Elixir of Iron
text: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
flavor_text: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper

name: Avarosan Trapper
text: When I'm summoned, create an Enraged Yeti in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavor_text: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."

name: Troop of Elnuks
text: Play: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and place the rest into your deck.
flavor_text: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Scarmother Vrynna

name: Take Heart
text: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
flavor_text:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

name: Catalyst of Aeons
text: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
flavor_text: Neither ruby nor sapphire surpass the luster of the aeon stone--a brilliant gem with legendary restorative properties.

name: Rimetusk Shaman
text: Round Start: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
flavor_text: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."

name: Ancient Yeti
text: Round End: Reduce my cost by 1.
flavor_text: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer

name: Mighty Poro
flavor_text: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder

name: Bloodsworn Pledge
text: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
flavor_text: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere

name: Flash Freeze
text: Frostbite an enemy.
flavor_text: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

name: Starlit Seer
text: When you play a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
flavor_text: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."

name: Tall Tales
text: If you have a Yeti, summon an Enraged Yeti. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
flavor_text: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger

name: They Who Endure
text: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
flavor_text: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Kindly Tavernkeeper

name: Babbling Bjerg
text: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
flavor_text: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"

name: Avarosan Sentry
text: Last Breath: Draw 1.
flavor_text: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."

name: Phantom Prankster
text: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.

name: Glimpse Beyond
text: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavor_text: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator

name: Elise
text: Attack: Summon an attacking Spiderling.
flavor_text: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.

name: Ancient Crocolith
text: To play me, kill 2 allies.
flavor_text:
"Put 'em in the cage, tum-te-dum... 
Pluck up every soul, one by one...
Never let ‘em go, no! No sir…
Else them spirits make quite a stir..."

name: Soul Shepherd
text: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, grant it +1|+1.
flavor_text: Only the fallen knew that she did not walk alone. Only they could see the countless companions she led down the path to lands beyond.

name: Onslaught of Shadows
text: Summon 2 Spectral Riders.
flavor_text: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.

name: Hecarim
text: Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
flavor_text: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.

name: Fresh Offerings
text: If 3+ allies have died this round, summon Vilemaw.
flavor_text: "Kneel before your fanged god. Better yet, die before it." - Elise

name: Cursed Keeper
text: Last Breath: Summon an Escaped Abomination.
flavor_text: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.

name: Scribe of Sorrows
text: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
flavor_text: "Little did our author know that soon the Ruinatio--the Ruin--no, no, no, that's not right, the ink's spilled again! Little did our author--no, no, no!"

name: Kalista
flavor_text: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.

name: Rhasa the Sunderer
text: Play: Kill the 2 weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
flavor_text: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

name: Scuttlegeist
text: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this game.
flavor_text: Once a beast of burden for a kingdom long forgotten, this monster now scavenges across forgotten battlefields, adding scrap to its shell, and the souls of the dead to its core.

name: Sinister Poro
flavor_text: I mean, there are worse ways to die.

name: Thresh
flavor_text:
"Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."

name: Commander Ledros
text:
Play: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
Last Breath: Return me to hand.
flavor_text: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.

name: The Harrowing
text: Revive the 6 strongest allies that died this game and grant them Ephemeral.
flavor_text: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.

name: The Undying
text: Last Breath: Revive me at the next Round Start and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died.
flavor_text: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...

name: Absorb Soul
text: Drain 4 from an ally.
flavor_text: "What kills you only makes me stronger." - Thresh

name: Crawling Sensation
text: If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
flavor_text: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

name: Tortured Prodigy
text: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
flavor_text: He toiled night and day, perfecting his composition. Then, in the blink of an eye, a dark silence blew through him. Others screamed and ran for their lives. He noticed nothing.

name: Oblivious Islander
text: Play: Grant an ally in hand Ephemeral and reduce its cost by 1.
flavor_text: Oh, the poor lad...

name: Iron Harbinger
text: Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally you have.
flavor_text: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.

name: Black Spear
text: If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
flavor_text: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

name: Hapless Aristocrat
text: Last Breath: Summon a Spiderling.
flavor_text: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"

name: Stirred Spirits
text: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and Ephemeral.
flavor_text: Some look at the Ruination and only see the destruction and misery. Others see the glass half full.

name: Haunted Relic
text: Summon 3 Unleashed Spirits.
flavor_text: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.

name: Frenzied Skitterer
text: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavor_text: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise

name: Vengeance
text: Kill a unit.
flavor_text: The betrayed invoke Kalista on their dying breath, hoping her spear brings them vengeance.

name: The Box
text: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
flavor_text: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

name: Ravenous Butcher
text: To play me, kill an ally.
flavor_text: You are what you eat.

name: Mistwraith
text: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths everywhere +1|+0.
flavor_text: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.

name: Mark of the Isles
text: Grant an ally +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavor_text: Power, but at what cost?

name: Possession
text: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies or landmarks already.)
flavor_text: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.

name: Splinter Soul
text: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral and 1|1.
flavor_text: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

name: Atrocity
text: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
flavor_text: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.

name: Mist's Call
text: Revive a random ally that died this round.
flavor_text: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator

name: Brood Awakening
text: Summon 3 Spiderlings, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
flavor_text: They're hungriest when they hatch.

name: Wraithcaller
text: Allegiance: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavor_text: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.

name: Shark Chariot
text: Last Breath: The next time an Ephemeral ally attacks, revive me attacking.
flavor_text: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon

name: Chronicler of Ruin
text: Play: Kill an ally, then revive it.
flavor_text: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.

name: Ethereal Remitter
text: Play: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
flavor_text: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!

name: Grasp of the Undying
text: Drain 3 from a unit.
flavor_text: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.

name: Spectral Matron
text: Play: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's Ephemeral.
flavor_text: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.

name: Arachnoid Horror
flavor_text: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.

name: The Rekindler
text: When I'm summoned, revive the strongest dead allied champion.
flavor_text: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?

name: Withering Wail
text: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
flavor_text: That which kills us makes them stronger.

name: Darkwater Scourge
flavor_text: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.

name: Warden's Prey
text: Last Breath: Create in hand another random Last Breath follower that costs 3 or less.
flavor_text: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…

name: Vile Feast
text: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
flavor_text: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

name: The Ruination
text: Kill ALL units.
flavor_text: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.

name: Soulgorger
flavor_text: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

name: Fading Memories
text: Pick a follower. Create an Ephemeral copy of it in hand.
flavor_text: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.

name: Subpurrsible
text:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other new cards this game, grant me +4|+0.
flavor_text: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...

name: Veteran Investigator
text: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
flavor_text: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.

name: Gotcha!
text:
When drawn, I cost 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavor_text:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"

name: Vault Breaker
text:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
flavor_text: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi

name: Insightful Investigator
text: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 and grant it Fleeting.
flavor_text: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook

name: Chief Mechanist Zevi
text: When you draw a card, grant it Fleeting and create an exact copy of it in hand.
flavor_text: At age five, she made the world's first multi-frequency sonic knife. While not very practical (she mostly used it to slice sandwiches), it set her on her way to the Wardens' elite Armaments Department.

name: Vi
text: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card (max +8|+0).
flavor_text: "Enforcer Vi, please! Think of the people! The collateral damage! The PAPERWORK FOR INJURY CLAIMS!" - Insightful Investigator

name: Trail of Evidence
text: Create in hand a random 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 2 less this round.
flavor_text: "And thus," Officer Harknor announced, "the trail leads us to..."

name: Suit Up!
text:
When drawn, I cost 2 less this round.
Grow an ally to 4|4.
flavor_text: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi

name: Patrol Wardens
text: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
flavor_text: Warden Mir's sprinting technique was a running joke among the other enforcers. Warden Kepple didn't get it.

name: Shellshocker
flavor_text: "MY GRATEST STRENF IS PREBABLE MY COMAND OF DA COMON PEEPUL AN ALSO APPARENLY MY SPELING IS RELLY GUD TO" - Note scribbled in sand

name: Slippery Waverider
flavor_text: "Swear I seen the strangest things over them reefs, Cap'n. Wha's that lunk put in 'em oranges? Tha's what I wanna know..." - Petty Officer

name: The Beast Below
flavor_text:
"Fear not the blasted beast ye know,
For some survive their thunder,
But what of them that broke the bow,
An' took them poor souls under?" - Found scratched into a Bilgewater tavern beam

name: Prowling Cutthroat
flavor_text: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."

name: Monkey Idol
text: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and summon a Powder Monkey.
flavor_text: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune

name: Devourer of the Depths
text: Play: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavor_text:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"

name: Crackshot Corsair
text: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."

name: Yordle Grifter
text: Allegiance: Nab 1 and create a Warning Shot in hand.
flavor_text: "Y'know, friends love to help friends out. And you? I like the shine in your eye and the glint on your cutlass! It is a really, really nice cutlass."

name: Shipwreck Hoarder
text: When I'm summoned, Toss 2 and create 2 Treasures in your deck.
flavor_text: "These days, there's more treasure 'neath the waves than above 'em, I wager. Would be easy enough pickins, if 'tweren't for her." - Jagged Butcher

name: Bubble Bear
flavor_text: Lively currents of magic weave through Serpent Isles' reefs, nourishing the sea's extraordinary inhabitants.

name: Brash Gambler
text:
To play me, discard 2.
Attack: Draw 2 and grant them Fleeting.
flavor_text: "Ain't nothing to it, most o' the time. Tables are full of fools too busy singing 'emselves hoarse to focus on the game. Not that I mind none. Coin's coin, and it's better in my pocket than theirs."

name: Coral Creatures
text: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavor_text: Most shallows teem with all kinds of marine life, but none compare to the reefs of the Azure Way. The Way is a magical, otherworldly place, full of wonder.

name: Jagged Taskmaster
text: Plunder: Grant 1 cost allies everywhere +1|+0.
flavor_text: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.

name: Citrus Courier
text: Plunder: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then Rally.
flavor_text: "All sailors think they so tough! Grr this. Yarr that. Yes yes. Very good. But you still need orange! Make skin pretty, make teeth stay, and make me happy. So you eat, or you swim. Easy."

name: Zap Sprayfin
text: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
flavor_text: Zap once completed the Azure Way circuit in just under three minutes. She even had to dodge the Jilldaw's shattered hull near the end! The currents that day were AWESOME.

name: Razorscale Hunter
text: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavor_text: "I've heard he'll swim miles to find his mark, 'n when he finds 'em, he never misses his shot. Not sure if he's a man or a fish, but it's clear he knows these waters far better'n we do." - Jagged Butcher

name: Sheriff Lariette Rose
text: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies Vulnerable.
flavor_text: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.

name: Jagged Butcher
text: Plunder: Grant me +1|+1.
flavor_text: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.

name: Riptide Rex
text: Plunder: Play Cannon Barrage 7 times on randomly targeted enemies.
flavor_text:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"

name: Abyssal Eye
text: Nexus Strike: Draw 1.
flavor_text:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"

name: Petty Officer
text: Play: Summon a Powder Keg or a random 1 cost follower.
flavor_text: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

name: Dreg Dredgers
text: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavor_text: It takes a special sort to make complete garbage of perfectly seaworthy gear. But if there's one thing they're good at, it's that. Just that.

name: Dreadway Deckhand
text: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
flavor_text: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."

name: The Dreadway
text:
When I'm summoned, draw Gangplank. 
Double all damage dealt by your spells, Skills and allies.
flavor_text:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"

name: Slotbot
text: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
flavor_text: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.

name: Hunting Fleet
text: When I'm summoned, your opponent summons a Golden Narwhal.
flavor_text: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.

name: Smooth Soloist
text: Plunder: Reduce the cost of allies in hand and deck by 2.
flavor_text: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter

name: The Syren
text:
When I'm summoned, draw Miss Fortune.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavor_text: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.

name: Plunder Poro
text: Plunder: Grant me 2 random keywords.
flavor_text: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank

name: Pool Shark
text: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next Round Start and grant it Fleeting.
flavor_text: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler

name: Hired Gun
text: When I'm summoned, grant the strongest enemy Vulnerable.
flavor_text: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."

name: Jaull Hunters
text: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
flavor_text: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.

name: Mystifying Magician
text: Play: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
flavor_text:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"

name: Golden Narwhal
flavor_text: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.

name: Black Market Merchant
text:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
Plunder: Nab 1.
flavor_text: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"

name: Gangplank
text: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
flavor_text: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand

name: Miss Fortune
text: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."

name: Fizz
text: When you play a spell, stop all enemy spells and Skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
flavor_text: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...

name: Twisted Fate
text: Play: Play a Destiny Card.
flavor_text: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."

name: Nautilus
flavor_text: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note

name: Pocket Aces
text:
When drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
flavor_text: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate

name: Double Trouble
text: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
flavor_text:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

name: Strong-arm
text: Plunder: Recall ANY follower into your hand.
flavor_text: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer

name: Chum the Waters
text: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and summon Longtooth.
flavor_text: "Shark!" - Fizz

name: More Powder!
text: Summon 2 Powder Kegs.
flavor_text: "Barrel!" - Gangplank

name: Parrrley
text:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.

name: Jailbreak
text: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavor_text:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

name: Pick a Card
text:
To play, place a card from hand into your deck.
Draw 2 at the next Round Start and grant them Fleeting.
flavor_text: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate

name: Playful Trickster
text: Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
flavor_text: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz

name: Riptide
text:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
flavor_text: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus

name: Mind Meld
text: This round, grow allies' Power and Health to the number of other spells you've played this game.
flavor_text: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.

name: Scrapshot
text:
Toss 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
flavor_text: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying

name: Lure of the Depths
text:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies everywhere by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
flavor_text: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.

name: Double Up
text:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "I always shoot first." - Miss Fortune

name: Salvage
text:
Toss 2.
Draw 2.
flavor_text: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk...

name: Pilfered Goods
text:
Nab 1.
Plunder: Nab 1 more.
flavor_text: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.

name: Ye Been Warned
text: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
flavor_text: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand

name: Sleight of Hand
text: Plunder: Draw a random non-champion card from the enemy hand.
flavor_text: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate

name: Make it Rain
text: Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune

name: Warning Shot
text: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer

name: Jettison
text: Toss 4.
flavor_text: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer

name: Island Navigator
text: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Scout.
flavor_text:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous

name: Wolfrider
