text: Plunder: Get an empty mana gem.
flavor_text: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.

name: Caught in the Cold
text: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
flavor_text: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani

name: Sejuani
text: Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
flavor_text: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.

name: Ember Maiden
text: Round Start: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavor_text:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme

name: Ursine Spiritwalker
text: Plunder: I transform into Stormclaw Ursine.
flavor_text: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.

name: Shared Spoils
text:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
Plunder: Draw 1 of them.
flavor_text: "Share and share alike." - Ruthless Raider

name: The Tuskraider
text:
When I'm summoned, Draw Sejuani.
Plunder: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
flavor_text: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard

name: Fury of the North
text: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
flavor_text: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani

name: Ruthless Raider
flavor_text: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.

name: Aurora Porealis
text: Create 2 random Poros and 2 Poro Snax in hand.
flavor_text:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger

name: The Leviathan
text:
When I'm summoned, draw Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus twice.
flavor_text: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.

name: Swain
text: Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."

name: Citybreaker
text: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”

name: Aurok Glinthorn
text: Attack: Stun all damaged enemies.
flavor_text: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”

name: Ravenous Flock
text: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
flavor_text: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.

name: Imperial Demolitionist
text: Play: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."

name: Noxian Fervor
text: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
flavor_text: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain

name: Armored Tuskrider
text: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
flavor_text: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider

name: Death's Hand
text: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain

name: Iron Ballista
flavor_text: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer

name: Loyal Badgerbear
flavor_text: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.

name: Greathorn Companion
flavor_text: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.

name: Greenfang Warden
flavor_text: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."

name: Quinn
text: When I'm summoned, summon Valor.
flavor_text: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight

name: Grizzled Ranger
text: Last Breath: Summon a Loyal Badgerbear.
flavor_text: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."

name: Unyielding Spirit
text: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
flavor_text: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.

name: Blinding Assault
text: Summon Valor.
flavor_text: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

name: Genevieve Elmheart
text: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavor_text: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.

name: Ranger's Resolve
text: Give allies Tough this round.
flavor_text: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden

name: Concerted Strike
text: Pick an enemy. 2 allies strike it one after another.
flavor_text: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden

name: Sap Magic
text:
Toss 3.
Heal allies 3.
flavor_text: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai

name: Deadbloom Wanderer
text: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavor_text: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal

name: Maokai
text: Each round, the first time you summon another ally, Toss 2 and summon a Sapling.
flavor_text: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.

name: Thorny Toad
text: Last Breath: Toss 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
flavor_text: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal

name: Terror of the Tides
text:
Sea Monster allies have Fearsome. 
Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavor_text: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.

name: Neverglade Collector
text: When another ally dies, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal

name: Overgrown Snapvine
text: When you play a follower, kill it to summon an Overgrown Snapvine.
flavor_text:
"Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!"
- Recovered journal

name: Blighted Caretaker
text: Play: Kill an ally to summon 2 Saplings.
flavor_text: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"

name: Barkbeast
text: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
flavor_text: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.

name: Sapling Toss
text: Summon a Sapling at the next Round Start.
flavor_text: "Wheeeeeeee!" - Sapling

name: Sonic Wave
text:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
flavor_text: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin

name: Scales of the Dragon
text: When I'm summoned, create a Dragon's Protection in hand.
flavor_text: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon

name: Lee Sin
text:
When you play a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you play another, give me Barrier this round.
flavor_text: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."

name: Horns of the Dragon
flavor_text: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon

name: Eye of the Dragon
text: Round Start: Flow: Summon a Dragonling.
flavor_text:
"A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us."
- Teachings of the Dragon

name: Claws of the Dragon
text: While I'm in hand, summon me when you play 2 spells in a round.
flavor_text: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon

name: Concussive Palm
text: Stun an enemy to summon a Tail of the Dragon.
flavor_text: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon

name: Retreat
text: Recall an ally to create a Fleeting Return in hand.
flavor_text: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...

name: Dragon's Rage
text:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking the enemy then the enemy Nexus.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
flavor_text: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

name: Deep Meditation
text:
Flow: I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 other spells.
flavor_text: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.

name: Hunt the Weak
text: Your opponent discards the weakest follower from hand.
flavor_text: "The frail have no place in this world. Each day brings them new torment, another turn of the vise. I do not deal in death, I deal in mercy." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Wild Claws
text: An ally strikes an enemy. If it has Overwhelm, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: "Oooh the wildman's looking EXTRA savage today! Stay clear of those claws, folks!" - Arena Battlecaster

name: Riven
text: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
flavor_text: "I will not run from what I was. I made a promise to mend what I have broken..."

name: Weapon Hilt
text: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
flavor_text: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Arrel the Tracker
text: Round End: If you played a spell on me this round, I strike the weakest enemy.
flavor_text:
"Hide, we will find you. 
Breathe, we will hear you.
Run, we will kill you."

name: Apprehend
text:
Stun an enemy.
If you have a Darius, Rally.
flavor_text: "I'll handle this myself." - Darius

name: Wrathful Rider
flavor_text: "There is nothing like hunting another soldier. To track them, you must think and feel as they do. To catch them, you must fear them as they fear you. It is a bond that few will know, but one I savor above all others."

name: Basilisk Bloodseeker
text: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavor_text: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.

name: Survival Skills
text:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your strongest ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
flavor_text: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Sharpened Resolve
text: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
flavor_text: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire

name: Blade Squire
text: Last Breath: Reforge.
flavor_text: "Like the huntresses said--a hundred days and nights. A hundred blisters on these feet, a hundred bugs in my breakfast, a hundred 'blade'-this and 'vengeance' that. And well more than a hundred brow-beatings from those three, I'll tell you..."

name: Runeweaver
text: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
flavor_text: "Most weapons are crude tools, no better than the hands that wield them. But a weapon infused with runic magic is so much more than mere steel."

name: Brutal Hunter
text: When I'm summoned, give me Quick Attack this round.
flavor_text: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."

name: Jack, the Winner
text: Round Start: Create a Sleep with the Fishes in hand.
flavor_text: Years in the boxing ring taught Jack valuable lessons. He learned that if his opponent can bleed, they can fear. He learned the power of a silent stare. He learned the power of uncontrolled violence.

name: Bayou Brunch
text: An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
flavor_text: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench

name: Sunk Cost
text: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
flavor_text: "Now, I delivered to you exactly what you wanted, friend. I never said it would last forever." - Tahm Kench

name: Tahm Kench
text: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create an An Acquired Taste in hand.
flavor_text: "My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."

name: Lounging Lizard
text: Round Start: Deal 2 to me.
flavor_text: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker

name: Monkey Business
text:
Summon a Powder Monkey.
Plunder: Summon another at the next Round Start.
flavor_text: "Aw... d'ye think they're cute? WELL, THEY'RE NOT. They get into everything, they're messier than a seasick courier, an' THEY WON'T BLOODY SHUT UP. NO MONKEYS ON THE SHIP. THAT'S THE END OF IT." - Petty Officer

name: Boxtopus
text: Play: Deal 3 to me.
flavor_text: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry

name: Boomship
text:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Summon Powder Kegs equal to the amount of damage dealt.
flavor_text: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor

name: The Slaughter Docks
text: Round Start: Toss 1. If you are Deep, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster.
flavor_text: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.

name: Crusty Codger
text: Play: Deal 2 to me.
flavor_text: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus

name: Wise Fry
text: Play: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
flavor_text: The rise to power is often a violent business... but it's not normally this freakin' sloppy.

name: Wiggly Burblefish
text:
I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavor_text: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker

name: Fortune Croaker
text: Play: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
flavor_text: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard

name: Powder Pandemonium
text: Summon a Powder Monkey for each time you've activated Plunder this game.
flavor_text: "Oh, those little sootballs aren't so bad. Here's a tip for you--they like fireworks. So, you take out an enemy's gunpowder stores, and the monkeys, well, they'll do the rest." - Miss Fortune

name: Shakedown
text: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies Vulnerable.
flavor_text: "You gonna tell me where you got those 'extra kegs', Slim? Huh? Otherwise, we could play a lil' tug-of-war between your tongue and Jimbo's arm. And buddy... I ain't bettin' on you." - Wise Fry

name: The Grand Plaza
text: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+1 and Challenger this round.
flavor_text: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.

name: The Howling Abyss
text: Round Start: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in hand, deck, or play.
flavor_text: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.

name: Divergent Paths
text: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
flavor_text: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.

name: Vaults of Helia
text: Round Start: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavor_text: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?

name: Monastery of Hirana
text: Round Start: Create a Sanctuary in hand.
flavor_text: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.

name: Scorched Earth
text: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
flavor_text: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Noxkraya Arena
text: Round End: Your strongest ally and the weakest enemy strike each other.
flavor_text: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster

name: Captain Arrika
text: Play: Capture a unit or landmark.
flavor_text: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.

name: Homecoming
text: Recall an ally unit or landmark to Recall an enemy unit or landmark.
flavor_text: "Trevvvvorrrrrr, come baaaack..." - Trevor's house

name: Star Spring
text: Round End: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, if I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game.
flavor_text:
"Up to the sacred falling flow,
Deep into pools, the healing springs
Shining light, water all aglow,
Listen to how the river sings,
High on the crystal mountain."
- Ottrani verse

name: Targon's Peak
text: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
flavor_text: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.

name: Crumble
text: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavor_text: Nothing lasts on these haunted isles. All will end.

name: The University of Piltover
text: Round Start: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them Fleeting.
flavor_text: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.

name: It That Stares
text: Play: Obliterate ALL landmarks or deal 3 to ALL other units.
flavor_text: "There was no time to gather our things or warn the others. We could only run for the forest and watch as it leveled our homes." - Avarosan Hearthguard

name: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear
text:
Daybreak: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
flavor_text: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"

name: Crystal Ibex
text: Play: Grant an ally Overwhelm.
flavor_text: Those seeking to scale Targon would do well to befriend the local fauna. No creature is more familiar with Targon's perilous gauntlet, and none can travel more swiftly across its icy terrain.

name: Behold the Infinite
text: Invoke.
flavor_text: The heavens hang over you, a tapestry of black lit with twinkling stars. You are small and dim against its vastness. Where will you turn your gaze first?

name: Starshaping
text: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 5.
flavor_text: "Look to the stars. If you're lucky, I'll look back." - Aurelion Sol

name: The Fangs
text: Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"Mother Moon, show me the way,
Tear the sky open,
Show me beyond."
- Lunari Prayer

name: Paddle Star
text: Deal 5 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
flavor_text: "KaBOOMey!" - Zoe

name: Lunari Duskbringer
text: When I'm summoned, create a Duskpetal Dust in hand.
flavor_text: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."

name: The Skies Descend
text: I cost 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have. Deal 15 to all enemies.
flavor_text: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol

name: Aphelios
text:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
flavor_text: "With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker

name: Sun Guardian
text: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Grant me +1|+1.
flavor_text: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription

name: Diana
text: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me Challenger this round.
flavor_text: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.

name: Resplendent Stellacorn
text: Play: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
flavor_text: "See that star moving across the night sky? That's a grown stellacorn. While the young ones lend us their healing magic until they can be returned to the sky, grown stellacorns can wield that power on their own. It is considered very lucky to see one and know it for what it is. Luckier still to care for one." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars

name: Supercool Starchart
text: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavor_text: "And these three EXTRA sparkly stars I call... 'The Celestial Jump Rope'! Or is it more of an upside down happy face?" - Zoe

name: Cygnus the Moonstalker
text: Nightfall: Give an ally Elusive this round.
flavor_text: The Lunari waited for nightfall and the safety it assured. The path ahead seemed deserted, but Cygnus knew the Solari camp lay just beyond. He gestured, and the others quietly fell in line behind him.

name: Lunari Shadestalker
text: Nightfall: Grant me Elusive.
flavor_text: "Let us cast our eyes toward the heavens, toward the sun, toward our lady's li-- Wait... What...? What is that...?" - Solari Priest

name: Blessing of Targon
text: Grant an ally +3|+3.
flavor_text: "A little something from Targon." - Taric

name: Mountain Goat
text: Strike: Create a Gem in hand.
flavor_text: The goats of Mount Targon are even more dangerous than their ordinary cousins, for the gems that make up their horns embed painful shards upon impact.

name: Broadbacked Protector
text: Round Start: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
flavor_text: "Nobody knows the paths of Targon like I do, so I get stuck with some of the, uh, willful stellacorns. Good thing they've got me to look after them!"

name: Sneaky Zeebles
text: Play: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavor_text: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.

name: Soraka
text: Support: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
flavor_text: "Healing is, by its very essence, selfless. You need not draw the power from them; they give it willingly. Show them compassion, and you will see how they shine."

name: Gift Giver
text: When I'm summoned, create a Gem in hand.
flavor_text: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."

name: Morning Light
text:
Give allies +1|+1 this round.
Activate an ally's Daybreak effect.
flavor_text: "We rise with the dawn! March into the light!" - Leona

name: Taric
text: Support: Give me and my supported ally Tough this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
flavor_text: "Taric's gentle kindness inspires all who meet him, galvanizing them to find the warmth within to bolster themselves on even the coldest of nights." - Mountain Scryer

name: Giddy Sparkleologist
text: Play: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavor_text: "...and then a sparklefly is like stardust that falls down to the ground and then flies back up and they're amazing and I saw one last night that was so pretty and I'm hungry and it flew up all the way to the STARS and then..."

name: Sparklefly
flavor_text: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess

name: Spacey Sketcher
text: Play: Discard 1 to Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavor_text: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."

name: Startled Stomper
flavor_text: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe

name: Leona
text: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavor_text: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.

name: The Cloven Way
text: Nightfall: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
flavor_text:
"Mother Moon, our night is set,
May we halt those who would harm us,
And teach them regret."
- Lunari Prayer

name: The Infinite Mindsplitter
text:
Play: Pick 2 enemies.
Round Start: Stun them.
flavor_text: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.

name: Inviolus Vox
text: Each round, when an ally with Fury kills an enemy for the first time, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
flavor_text: "Look to the heavens, and see as I do! First the signals, for by night they shine. Then the fury, for by day all burns. You will see! We will all see!" - Herald of Dragons

name: Moonlight Affliction
text:
Silence 2 enemy units this round.
Nightfall: They can't block this round.
flavor_text: "Those unaccustomed to the moonlight must learn to see by it, or they will see nothing at all." - Diana

name: Zoe
text: Nexus Strike: Create a Supercool Starchart in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
flavor_text: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."

name: Aurelion Sol
text:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
flavor_text: "I don't care what you write about me, you middling creature! Just make sure I'm described as handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very intelligent. Can you spell that?"

name: Bastion
text: Grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavor_text: "Honor the mountain." - Taric

name: The Flight
text: Nexus Strike: Draw 1 and place me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavor_text:
"Mother Moon, gift me confidence,
Fill me with The Flight's conviction,
Set me on my path."
- Lunari Prayer

name: Tyari the Traveler
text: Support: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
flavor_text: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.

name: Wish
text: Fully heal damaged allies.
flavor_text: "For life!" - Soraka

name: Sunburst
text:
Deal 6 to a unit.
Daybreak: Instead, Silence it this round and deal 6 to it.
flavor_text: Few things survive a gaze as unflinching as the sun's.

name: Astral Protection
text: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
flavor_text: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector

name: Spring Guardian
text: When I'm summoned, create a Spring Gifts in hand.
flavor_text: "Mostly, I mind the springs, but a shepherd's responsibility is first and foremost to their flock. Priorities have been known to collide."

name: Spell Thief
text: Manifest an enemy spell played this game.
flavor_text: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe

name: Solari Sunforger
text: Daybreak: Give me Lifesteal this round.
flavor_text: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.

name: Mentor of the Stones
text:
Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
Last Breath: Create 3 Gems in hand.
flavor_text:
"Did you catch anything he said in there?"
"Not a word. Seemed nice, though."
- Emir and Haley, Mountain Sojourners

name: Zenith Blade
text:
Grant an ally +1|+2. Give it Overwhelm this round.
Daybreak: Draw a Zenith Blade.
flavor_text: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest

name: Solari Priestess
text: Daybreak: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
flavor_text: The Solari look to the stars for guidance as much as any other Targonian, for the star dearest to their faith is the sun.

name: Solari Shieldbearer
text: Daybreak: Give me +0|+4 this round.
flavor_text:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.

name: Crescent Guardian
text: Nightfall: Grant me +2|+0.
flavor_text: "Stoic guardian, the gentle touch of the full moon restores your strength. Awaken and safeguard us from those who would trespass upon this sacred place." - Crescent Guardian's inscription

name: Guiding Touch
text: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
flavor_text: Stellacorns shine brightest when they are happy.

name: Dragon's Clutch
text: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavor_text: "Their cry sounds like a raspy cat. If you ever hear it, you're to turn tail, and find the nearest guard. You hear? Because where there's dragon eggs, there's dragons." - Targonian forager

name: Sunblessed Vigor
text: Grant an ally +0|+2.
flavor_text: "Our shield is our conviction, our resolve, our trust in the light!" - Solari Shieldbearer

name: Gifts From Beyond
text: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
flavor_text: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune

name: Moondreamer
text:
Play: Invoke.
Nightfall: Reduce that card's cost by 1.
flavor_text: "Look at all our friends out in the sky tonight! See that extra bright star? That's the Messenger's eye staring down at us! That dim cluster way out there? It is the Trickster hiding behind clouds! And that one over--KULUN, SHH! You cannot paw those down...!"

name: Eclipse Dragon
text:
Daybreak: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
Nightfall: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
flavor_text:
Dragon scale (Eclipse Dragon, Draco Obscuratus)
Notes: Scale has incredible optical properties. Highly reflective under direct sunlight.
Scribbled: IT ALSO GLOWS AT NIGHT!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Mountain Scryer
text:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
Allegiance: Invoke.
flavor_text: "There is much to learn from the stars, from their guidance. For us, they are a constant, a way to chart our path."

name: Star Shepherd
text: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
flavor_text: "Ever since I first saw one streak across the night sky, I've loved stellacorns. If only I'd known then that I'd meet so many!"

name: The Veiled Temple
text: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your strongest ally +1|+0.
flavor_text: It is here, in the Spirit Realm, that Alune communes with her brother Aphelios. It is she who speaks words of comfort to the silent assassin, and who reaches through the veil to hand him his weapons of retribution.

name: Starry Scamp
text: If you Behold a Celestial card, I cost 2 less.
flavor_text: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."

name: Fledgling Stellacorn
flavor_text: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars

name: Whiteflame Protector
flavor_text: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.

name: Herald of Dragons
text: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
flavor_text: The clouds twisted around their massive forms, and the sky itself seemed to shake with their keening wails. She knew what was to come, and yet felt not fear but the warm embrace of destiny.

name: Out Of The Way
text: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
flavor_text:
"You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
Back and I’m better and ready to stay."
- Kai'Sa, 'THE BADDEST'

name: Messenger's Sigil
text: Create 5 The Messengers in your deck.
flavor_text: "Time passes, skies turn--the Serpent moves aside and the Messenger takes its place overhead. A season of abundance awaits..." - Lunari Priestess

name: Shards of the Mountain
text: Fill your hand with Gems.
flavor_text: "Turn a gem just so, and it glimmers in the light. Like mortal lives, each has its own inner fire." - Taric

name: The Sky Shadows
text: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you Behold a Nightfall card.
flavor_text:
"Mother Moon, allow me to remember,
That though I stand in solitude,
Your children dance above,
And I am not alone."
- Lunari Prayer

name: Arbiter of the Peak
text: I cost 1 less for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
flavor_text: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.

name: Hush
text: Silence a unit this round.
flavor_text: "They will know serenity." - Soraka

name: Mountain Sojourners
text: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has Support, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
flavor_text: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.

name: Stargazer
text: When you heal a damaged ally, give it Elusive this round.
flavor_text: "Stars stay with us for only so long. Once they have been tended to, I return them to the sky in a sudden blaze of starlight... and flailing hooves."

name: Solari Soldier
text: Daybreak: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavor_text: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.

name: Grandfather Rumul
text: Play: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
flavor_text: "Listen, Osu. Do you hear that? Bells! Grandfather's back!" - Illi, Star Shepherd

name: Pale Cascade
text:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
flavor_text: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana

name: Lunari Priestess
text: Nightfall: Invoke.
flavor_text: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening

name: Starbone
text: If you Behold a Celestial, create The Messenger in your deck and grant Celestial allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavor_text:
"May the Messenger play,
And with his joy,
Light the stars."
- Lunari Prayer

name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
text: Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
flavor_text: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe

name: Fused Firebrand
flavor_text: Countless challenges await those climbing Mount Targon. Some, like the endless ascent, slowly sap the aspirants' strength. Others are much more immediate.

name: Porofly
flavor_text: In space, no one can hear you squee.

name: Patched Porobot
text: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
flavor_text: It's not quite as cuddly as the real thing, but it IS just as cute.

name: Ballistic Bot
text: Round Start: Create an Ignition in hand.
flavor_text:
Subject requested that we keep only his mind intact, stating "That's where I've stored all my grudges."
- Augmentor's log, entry 1011

name: Death Ray - Mk 1
text: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavor_text:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations

name: Viktor
text: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
flavor_text: "Zaun, you have seen your share of tragedies, and the time has come for change. And, as with all great advancements, it must start within you."

name: Mechanized Mimic
text: Attack: Grant me all keywords on allies.
flavor_text: "I'm just like you, only better."

name: Give It All
text:
Grow all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
flavor_text:
"I know I know
You want some more
If you ready let’s go
Giving it all"
- Seraphine, 'MORE'

name: Calculated Creations
text: Create an Armed Gearhead, Ballistic Bot, or Nyandroid in hand and grant it +1|+1.
flavor_text: "Rationality and choice separate humanity from its base animal instincts." - Viktor

name: Iterative Improvement
text: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
flavor_text: "Self-improvement is a game where you are the hero and the villain. You will struggle. You may even think you've won. But in the end, you will always be left standing in your own way." - Mechanized Mimic

name: Stress Testing
text: Remove Fleeting from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 Fleeting.
flavor_text: "It's simple stuff, really. I replaced the steel frame with a more durable alloy I invented, and rerouted the circuitry away from the hinges to stop the systems from shorting out. Easy peasy." - Chief Mechanist Zevi

name: Armed Gearhead
flavor_text: "Alright! New arm! Always wanted one of those. What've we got next? Gravwheels for legs? Electrobelts? METAL TEETH? Actually, leave my face. I like my face."

name: Hexcore Foundry
text: Round Start: ALL players draw 1.
flavor_text: "Let them say what they will about my methods. They cannot deny progress--the light of my knowledge is shining like a beacon through the darkness of ignorance!" - Viktor

name: Nyandroid
flavor_text: "I clawed my way through years of Piltovan academia only to have my technologies deemed 'too dangerous' and my very presence dismissed as 'too cute'! Meow to Zaun, where I know at least one great mind shares my ambitions..."

name: Aftershock
text: Deal 3 to a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavor_text: "This ray of light will guide our march to Piltover. Nothing will stand in the way of our Glorious Evolution!" - Viktor

name: Tri-beam Improbulator
text: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random 1 cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
flavor_text: "...and in one, two, and THREE!!! Oh. Oh, my word... Yet another unforeseen outcome?!" - Heimerdinger

name: Poro Cannon
text:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 Daring Poros in hand.
flavor_text: Two downy shapes arced gracefully over the adoring crowd, leaving a cloud of fluff and the faint scent of baked goods in their wake.

name: Stalking Shadows
text:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact Ephemeral copy in hand.
flavor_text: "Go... surround them..." - Nocturne

name: Evershade Stalker
text: Nightfall: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavor_text: "It was just a pair of eyes at first, and a lone voice chittering in the shadows. More every time I looked back. Angrier. Louder. Soon as I saw the Tooth, I ran." - Whale's Tooth looter

name: Gluttony
text: Kill an ally with Last Breath to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavor_text: "SUPPAH TIIIIME!" - Ravenous Butcher

name: Passage Unearned
text: Obliterate all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
flavor_text:
"Of course, death is present in Demacia. We see it take our loved ones and know that, someday, it will come for us. But on these isles... I can almost taste death. I feel it in my lungs as I breathe, I hear it whisper in my ear. It is not some abstract notion. It sits with me here. Now. And it will have us all."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Encroaching Shadows
text: Grant ALL allies in your deck and hand +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavor_text:
"Mind or body, I fear that the nightmares of the Shadow Isles will break us all eventually, and insanity will reign forever."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Go Hard
text:
Drain 1 from a unit.
Create 2 copies of Go Hard in your deck. Every third time this happens, transform all copies of me everywhere into Pack Your Bags.
flavor_text:
"We go hard, 'til we get it, get it
We go hard, we so in it, in it
We Pop Stars (Pop Stars), only winning, winning now
Ain't nobody bringing us down, down, down, down"
- Evelynn, 'POP/STARS'

name: Shroud of Darkness
text: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and SpellShield this round.
flavor_text: "Soon as you step outside the Tooth, you'll feel 'em. Fingertips on your nape, light as rain. Them creatures don't budge when you come at 'em, neither. Ain't afraid of my blade or my torch. Nothin'. Awful things." - Whale's Tooth looter

name: Nocturne
text: Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavor_text:
"It appears that, once enough souls have been shaken, it breaches our world. Only hope can send the monstrosity back to its realm... but hope died here long ago, on a queen's final breath, and with a king's eternal scream."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Doombeast
text: Nightfall: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavor_text: With each passing night, the travelers grew more weary. Their slumber was restless, and their dreams vivid. Sleep no longer gave respite, and instead pulled the life from their bones.

name: Pesky Specter
text: Last Breath: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
flavor_text: Most of the spirits on the Shadow Isles are utterly terrifying and morbid creatures. A small handful are... well... just really, really annoying.

name: Stygian Onlooker
text: Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Fearsome this round.
flavor_text: As the sun melts into pitch, the terrors of this place wake, watch, and wait.

name: Unspeakable Horror
text:
Drain 1 from anything.
Nightfall: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
flavor_text:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Duskrider
text: Nightfall: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated Nightfall this game.
flavor_text: With every setting sun, the night unfurls its dark wings, and blots out the day's last remnants of hope.

name: Risen Mists
text: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavor_text: The mistwraiths move through planes unseen by mortal eyes, appear without warning, and inflict misery on all they encounter.

name: Flurry of Fists
text: Grant an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack. If it already has it, grant it Double Attack instead.
flavor_text: "Hit often, hit fast, and hit hard." - Horns of the Dragon

name: Pix!
text: Support: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
flavor_text:
"Pix is AWESOME, he's small and cool and wholesome,
His favorite things are possums, and he likes to... hrmhmhmhrmthrossom!" - Lulu

name: Whimsy!
text: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round.
flavor_text: "Adoribus!" - Lulu

name: Flower Child
text: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
flavor_text: Everyone wants a familiar, but no one's prepared for the responsibility. You've gotta take them on walkies, make sure they're eating a balanced diet... house-train them. It's a lot of work.

name: Singular Will
text: Pick an ally. Recall ALL other units and landmarks.
flavor_text: "I walk my path alone." - Solitary Monk

name: Lulu
text: Support: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
flavor_text: "Don't you worry, Pix! We're gonna get outta the Glade, and we're gonna adoribus ALL THE THINGS! Are you ready?!"

name: Swole Squirrel
text: Strike: Double my Power.
flavor_text: His secret is acorn powder shakes, four times a day.

name: Tasty Faefolk
flavor_text: Energy: 104kJ (25 kcal), Carbohydrates: 5.88g, Sugars: 3.53g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Fat: 0.18g, Protein: 0.98g, Water: 92g...

name: Fae Guide
text: Play: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavor_text: "Shh! This way! We've gotta make a sharp left after the walking treehouse, then go straight past the talking flowers. Lu, you listening to me? Lu? Lu! LULU! Do. NOT. Feed them. Do not do that."

name: Trevor Snoozebottom
text: Support: Create an attacking Mumblesprite with my supported ally's stats.
flavor_text: You're supposed to follow your dreams, not manifest them through inadvertent muttered conjuration as you sleep-float through an ancient magical forest. I mean SHEESH.

name: Young Witch
text: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack and +1|+0 this round.
flavor_text: Sir Ribery Montague left home hoping to complete some great quest or curry favor with a notable house. But fate led him to a hidden bandlewood, where young Bri quickly transformed Sir Ribery into a frog, and yanked him off on HER adventures. Poor Rib!

name: Nopeify!
text: Stop a Fast or Slow spell that costs 3 or less.
flavor_text: "Don't do that, you silly smufflefloof! You might hurt the antylopes!" - Lulu

name: Go Get It
text: Recall an ally to summon an exact Ephemeral copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
flavor_text:
"More
Know I got it,
So here you go,
You look like you could use some more."
- Akali, 'MORE'

name: Fuzzy Caretaker
text:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
flavor_text: The purple faefolk are sweet little creatures, and cared for by all those who encounter them. Well, almost all.

name: Dragonguard Lieutenant
text: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, grant me Challenger.
flavor_text: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."

name: Confront
text:
Grant an ally Challenger.
If it's a Dragon, draw 1.
flavor_text: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana

name: Stony Suppressor
text: ALL spells cost 1 more.
flavor_text: What begins as a shapeless, rough-hewn block of petricite quickly becomes something more under the clever hands of its sculptor. That is when a piece truly starts to come to life.

name: Screeching Dragon
flavor_text: All creatures are fiercely protective of their young, but few are as well equipped to deal with would-be threats as a dragon.

name: Molten Breath
text: An ally with Fury strikes the 2 weakest enemies one after another.
flavor_text: For centuries, the Demacians only knew of a dragon's fury through legend. Wrenwall changed that.

name: Strafing Strike
text: An ally and an enemy strike each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 5.
flavor_text: When knight and dragon separated, panting and wounded, the latter seemed reinvigorated. It smelled blood, and was eager for more.

name: Shyvana
text: Attack: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavor_text:
"On the one hand, she is, by her very nature, our most hated foe, her kind having historically brought only anguish to Demacia. On the other, she is trusted by the Prince, and seems to have all the makings of a determined soldier and valuable ally. I only hope that she does not betray the trust we have placed in her."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall

name: Dragonguard Lookout
text: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, Rally.
flavor_text:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia

name: Stalking Broodmother
flavor_text: "Careful, soldiers! If we tread carefully and don't disturb the nest, we can keep the mother dragon on the defensive. If we rile her up any further... Well, you'll want to be ready to run." - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Egghead Researcher
text: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon in hand.
flavor_text:
Dragon Egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco Murmurationis) 
Location: Recovered by researcher Anden Mayne on Expedition. 
Notes: Gestation period unknown. Incubation continued. Recent movement observed within shell. Egg responds to heat, light, hammer. Current studies inconclusive. 
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Kadregrin the Infernal
text: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies everywhere +4|+4.
flavor_text: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.

name: For The Fallen
text:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
flavor_text: "If a soldier falls, another must take their place. Our banner must never fall." - Garen

name: Sharpsight
text: Give an ally +1|+2 and Sharpsight this round.
flavor_text: Any who would dare breach Demacia's walls will find a full company awaiting them--forewarned and heavily armed.

name: The Scargrounds
text: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and Tough.
flavor_text: There are many places of honor among the Winter's Claw, but one of the greatest is The Scargrounds, where damaged war vessels that have returned from raids are repurposed as gathering halls for warriors and their kin. These ships embody the tribe that built them--resilient and adaptable.

name: Troll Scavenger
text: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
flavor_text:
The scout knelt by a tattered edge of cloth hidden in the snow, where the scent of human sweat and fire smoke lingered in the cold air.
He pulled the material free and saw at one end, a talisman dangled, dull under the stormy sky. Avarosan.

name: Revitalizing Roar
text:
Pick a unit in hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
Enlightened: Reduce its cost to 0.
flavor_text: "Fully grown trolls have thick hides and dense bones that heal quickly, making them terrible, tenacious foes. Cut them down quickly, lest they recover to fight again another day." - Avarosan Marksman

name: Augur of the Old Ones
text: Play: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant an ally Overwhelm and Regeneration.
flavor_text: It is said that very few trolls are taught the chants of the Old Ones, and that those who know them can call on their forebears to imbue their brethren with exceptional strength.

name: Trundle
text: When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
flavor_text:
One by one, torches lit along the pass, throwing the scene into sharp relief. There were dozens of trolls, maybe hundreds, each one hulking, massive, and deadly.
"I'll ask one more time," Trundle snarled, hefting Boneshiver over one shoulder. "Are you gonna give up, or am I gonna have to break your skulls?"

name: Icequake
text: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
flavor_text: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle

name: Troll Chant
text: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavor_text: Troll chants are highly varied. They differ from group to group, and are often incomprehensible. They are all, however, terrifying to witness.

name: Uzgar the Ancient
flavor_text:
They felt it before they heard it, the ground trembling beneath their feet, but it quickly became audible, like distant thunder drawing closer.
Meyrick lifted his head, eyes wide, listening.
"What is it?" Anya whispered urgently, drawing her bow, but Meyrick was already sprinting back toward the path. 
"RUN!"

name: Troll Ravager
text: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me Regeneration.
flavor_text: Once they were among the Avarosan huts, they called Hgar forward. With a laugh, she raised Snowsunder, ready to use the weapon to batter the wooden homes into little more than splinters.

name: Call the Wild
text: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
flavor_text: "...an' then a BIIIIG HUUUGE ELNUK came FLYIN' out of the trees with a teeny lil' poro on his back an' there was a FRIENDLY YETI as well because he wanted to play with his friends an' they all ran down the mountain goin' RAAAAAWRRRR an' then..." - Ingvar the Younger

name: Faces of the Old Ones
text: Round Start: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
flavor_text:
"Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Rule of ice, break the sky.
Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Bring us strength, them demise."
- Troll chant

name: Voices of the Old Ones
text:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 5 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
flavor_text: For generations, Avarosan settlers heard strange, inexplicable sounds within the tumult of winter storms. Eventually, when they ventured much farther north, they finally discovered the source--ancient troll monoliths whispering in long-lost tongues as the wind swept through their yawning maws.

name: Troll Gifts
text: Grant an ally Regeneration. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
flavor_text: Pity those who see the promise of victory in a troll's blood.

name: Feel The Rush
text: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Grow their stats up to 10|10.
flavor_text:
"We got it all in our hands now
So can you handle what we're all about?"
- Ahri, 'POP/STARS'

name: Ekko
text: Strike: Create a Fleeting Time Trick in hand.
flavor_text: It's not about how much time you have, it's about how you spend it.

name: Chirean Sumpworker
text: When you summon another Chirean Sumpworker, Obliterate me and transform allied Chirean Sumpworkers everywhere into Sumpworks Posses.
flavor_text: The first Zaunite miners to discover the chirean thought them timid, simple creatures. But as the years passed, and as they grew comfortable with humans, they slowly revealed their close societal bonds, and their seemingly native understanding of technology.

name: Production Surge
text: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
flavor_text: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger

name: Timewinder
text:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
flavor_text: "Look out!" - Ekko

name: Called Shot
text:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
flavor_text: "Splitting the timelines..." - Ekko

name: Fallen Feline
text: When I'm summoned, create a Hexite Crystal in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
flavor_text: "BUT MY PLAAAANNN--MEEEOOOOOW!"

name: Defective Swapbot
text: Play: Swap my stats with another unit.
flavor_text:
"A new slotbot? Didn't they shut down the plant that made these years ago?"
"I thought so. Something about 'rolling bombs' and 'unintended conflagration."
"Huh."
"...Wanna play?"
"Absolutely yes."
- Zaunite patrons

name: Volunteer Elnuk
text: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavor_text: "OKAY, LITTLE BUDDY, YOU JUST SIT STILL WHILE I FLIP THIS SWITCHAROO OVER HEEERE AND BOOM! HA! ELNUKS FOREVER! We're totally gonna need more grass. And room." - Practical Perfectionist

name: Concurrent Timelines
text: Grant followers in your hand "When you play me, pick 1 of 3 followers with my cost and transform me into that follower."
flavor_text: "We're playing by MY rules." - Ekko

name: Boom Baboon
text: When I'm summoned, create a Flame Chompers! in hand.
flavor_text: Jinx had a more conventional supplier once, but the two of them had a small falling out. By which we mean, the supplier fell out of a window. By which we mean, the supplier was blown out of a window. By Jinx.

name: Time Trick
text: Predict, then draw 1.
flavor_text: "The future's what I make it..." - Ekko

name: Practical Perfectionist
text: Play: Predict. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
flavor_text: "Kay's awesome. She's got that whole 'practice makes perfect' mentality, you know? And boyyy does she practice." - Shomi

name: Glorious Evolution
text: Your cards have -1 cost, Augment, are created by Glorious Evolution, and are now Tech.
flavor_text: "Progress is everything. I will bring the future to this city, whether it is ready or not." - Viktor

name: Adaptatron 3000
text: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
flavor_text: "Ah yes! The Adaptatron 3000! Adaptable, inventive, AND quite the looker! If the fellow could speak, I'm sure we'd have MUCH to share with each other." - Heimerdinger

name: Dropboarder
text: If you see me in a Prediction, summon me.
flavor_text: "Ahh, Shomi's a GENIUS with that hoverboard. I once saw them switch a sumpgrinder into a bottomboard backslide, then catch air with a three-point triple dip! Or something. Look, the point is, they're awesome, okay?" - Practical Perfectionist

name: Bone Skewer
text: An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
flavor_text: "Little parting gift..." - Pyke

name: Jaull-fish
text: Play: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
flavor_text: "Ain't nothin' like a jaull-fish to show you who you can trust, and who you can kill." - Pyke

name: Redfin Hammersnout
text: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavor_text: When a hammersnout breaks a ship's keel, it seems to do it for sheer entertainment. They rarely devour the crew they stranded, instead leaving a feast for the creatures that follow.

name: Pyke
text: When I Lurk, transform me into Death From Below.
flavor_text:
"...the visions are back again. I see his desperate eyes looking up at me whilst the jaull-fish closed its maw around him. We tried pulling, but the ship was too small, and the beast too big. I had no choice. I had to cut his line. I had to."
- Blood-soaked letter

name: Monster Harpoon
text:
Plunder: I cost 2 less.
Deal 5 to a unit.
flavor_text: "The beast's been stuck already, lads! Now stick it again 'til it stops thrashin' and the waters've lost their blue!" - Jagged Taskmaster

name: Line 'Em Up
text:
Summon a Powder Keg.
Create a Knock 'Em Down in hand.
flavor_text: "Done as you asked, Cap'n. Give 'er a little spark and she'll kick back alright." - Dreadway Deckhand

name: Loaded Dice
text: Next round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, Nab 1.
flavor_text: "So, what are you willin' to wager, friend?" - Tahm Kench

name: Sharkling
flavor_text: "Might not look much, aye, but they're eager for blood. And if you let 'em at you, they'll know where to find it when they're bigger. Best wear yer gloves." - Jaull Hunters

name: Snapjaw Swarm
text: Play: I start a free attack.
flavor_text:
"Drip, drop, drip, drop, the blood splashes down,
Swim, swim, comes the swarm, better now to drown,
Snip, snap, go the teeth, and we all scream,
To the deep, off we sleep, for forever dreams!"
- Bilgewater nursery rhyme

name: Ripper's Bay
text: When allies attack, before activating Lurk, grant the top ally in your deck Lurk and it becomes a Lurker.
flavor_text: Bilgewater's more treacherous coves soon became home to all manner of sea beasts. There they lie, waiting for the next foolhardy crew to ignore the harbormaster's warnings.

name: Lost Riches
text: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
flavor_text: "We're rich!" - Jagged Butcher

name: Reaver's Row
text:
When I count down, summon a random 1 cost follower.
Countdown 2: Grant 1 cost allies +2|+1 and Fearsome.
flavor_text: "Ye think ye've got what it takes to call yourself a Hook, do ye? We'll see, ye tyke. By the time we're done with ye, ye'll either be worth yer weight, or ye'll be weighed down below the waves, bait fer the beasts!" - Petty Officer

name: Bloodbait
text: Create a Snapjaw Swarm on top of your deck.
flavor_text: "If it were up ta me, I'd have a jaull-fish take me afore them bloody things. Sooner go fast than be left screamin' fer me mates to stick me while I'm eaten alive." - Jagged Butcher

name: Ruined Rex
text: Play: Play Cannon Barrage on randomly targeted enemies for each card you've drawn this round, up to 6 times.
flavor_text: "...Rex?" - Petty Officer

name: The List
text: Grant an enemy Vulnerable. If it's already Vulnerable, the strongest ally starts a free attack Challenging it.
flavor_text: "You've got a name, and I've got a list." - Pyke

name: Defiant Dance
text:
Recall a unit.
Blade Dance 1.
flavor_text: "Fall back! It's time for another to take center stage!" - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

name: Irelia
text: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavor_text: "Once we studied art and beauty, and our hearts soared. But when they broke our walls and spilled our blood, we fell back down to earth..."

name: Scattered Pod
text:
Play: Draw a Slow, Fast, or Burst spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavor_text: The strange and hauntingly beautiful sky-songs of the Cloud Drinkers kept some of the Black Mist at bay... but only for so long.

name: Blossoming Blade
text: Play: Blade Dance 2.
flavor_text:
"There are those who think a flower is a fragile, delicate thing. They forget how much strength it takes to hold fast to the humble earth and inspire hope with every bloom."
- Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

name: Vanguard's Edge
text: Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
flavor_text: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia

name: Dancing Droplet
text: When I'm Recalled, draw 1.
flavor_text: "Water is flexible, adaptive - it will take the form most needed in the moment, flowing forth or retreating from the shore." - Ionian monk

name: Shadow Apprentice
text: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavor_text: "You are smoke—a whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi

name: Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
text:
When you Blade Dance, I attack with the Blades.
Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavor_text: "Gather round, my darlings. Today our feet will glide 'cross the ground that nourished us, with the movements our families taught us. We are children of Ionia, and today we dance for art, for freedom, for each other!"

name: Syncopation
text: Swap 2 allies.
flavor_text: "To dance is to move in harmony with the motions of all things." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

name: Lead and Follow
text: Recall an ally to create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavor_text: "Our performance will be... unforgettable." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

name: Sacred Protector
text:
Play: Give an ally Barrier this round and draw a Shen.
Allies with Barrier have Double Attack.
flavor_text: "Just as we fight to protect the land, the land itself rises up to defend us. We draw strength from the earth's wrath and drive out our enemies. And so, balance remains." - Ionian Priest

name: Shadows of the Past
text: Recall each ally and summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavor_text: "Let them strike at shadows, where their weapons will find no purchase." - Zed

name: Ribbon Dancer
text: Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavor_text: "What a shame, boys! All that power and just no rhythm to match it? We can't ALL be stars, I guess...!"

name: Field Musicians
text: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1.
flavor_text: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.

name: Coastal Defender
text: When you summon another ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavor_text:
My dearest Kay, 
They arrived this morning in a line of ships that broke the horizon and blotted out the sunrise. Their machines set fire to the Silver Plains, and now a thick smoke crawls through the summer air. We can stand by no longer. Rake or shovel, scythe or sword, today we must go to meet our destiny. 
Know that I love you and our home more than I have words to write.
- Charred letter

name: Careful Preparation
text:
To play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
Predict, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
flavor_text: "The actions we take today plant seeds for future trees." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer

name: Unworthy
text:
Give an enemy follower -4|-0 this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
flavor_text: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen

name: Baccai Sandspinner
text: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
flavor_text: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.

name: Voice of the Risen
text: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
flavor_text: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."

name: Rek'Sai
text:
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.
Round End: Place me into your deck.
flavor_text: "Young Jhuraa was exploring, as is his way, and in a small hidden cave, discovered some ancient texts! We took them to a translator in Marrowmark, and the scrolls... they speak of an ancient terror who stalked our ancestors. A queen. A xer'sai queen!" - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder

name: The Absolver
text: Give an ally +2|+1 this round. If you have leveled a champion this game, create a The Absolver's Return in hand.
flavor_text: "Everyone told me not to use this. 'No one must wield such a powerful weapon,' they said." - Akshan

name: Desert Naturalist
text: Play: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavor_text:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary

name: Raz Bloodmane
text: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavor_text: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."

name: Sandcrafter
text: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavor_text: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.

name: Call the Pack
text:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
flavor_text:
"May the sun shine, and may the xer'sai sleep."
- Merchant's prayer

name: Payday
text: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavor_text: "Sure, I've had good days and bad days, just like anyone. In this line of work, the bad days can get real bad, and the good days can get real rich." - Sivir

name: Ancient Preparations
text:
Play: Predict.
Countdown 2: Summon a Clockling.
flavor_text: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.

name: Treasure Seeker
text: When I'm summoned, create a Waking Sands in hand.
flavor_text: "Okay, Davu. You're gonna go in there, grab that... whatever it is, and you're going to make us rich. Me rich. You're going to make me rich. Got it? Also, if that's a trapped thing, I am real sorry in advance."

name: Baccai Reaper
text: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
flavor_text: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Hibernating Rockbear
text: Countdown 3: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavor_text:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary

name: Callous Bonecrusher
text: Reputation: I cost 1 less and when I'm summoned, grant me Overwhelm.
flavor_text: The soldier struggled as he reached for his spear, but she leaned harder on his chest until he ceased, groaning. "No, no," she admonished, showing her sharpened eyeteeth with a wicked smile. "This is mine, now."

name: Ruin Runner
flavor_text: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.

name: Zilean
text: Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
flavor_text: Over many years, Zilean established a network of promising young mages from different times, all of whom were capable of seeing out his life's work should the unthinkable happen. Although a kind and encouraging mentor, deep sorrow creased his brow when he sought solitude, and there was a weariness in his eyes that only someone who has lived multiple lifetimes could hope to comprehend.

name: Taliyah
text: Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
flavor_text:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima

name: Khahiri the Student
text: When I'm summoned, if you've Predicted this game, grant me +1|+1.
flavor_text:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"

name: Salt Spire
text: Countdown 2: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the strongest ally +2|+2.
flavor_text: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.

name: Azir
text: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavor_text: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Xenotype Researchers
text: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
flavor_text: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.

name: Akshan
text: When I'm summoned or strike: Summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 1 round.
flavor_text: "The Sentinels' code seems full of complicated restrictions. Things like 'Never take a life in the name of vengeance' and 'Fight for the world, never for yourself'. As for me..."

name: Desert's Wrath
text:
Grant allied Sand Soldiers everywhere +1|+0.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavor_text: They do not rest. They do not hesitate. They are uncompromising, unfeeling, unyielding.

name: Renekton
text: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
flavor_text: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Imagined Possibilities
text: Create a random landmark with Countdown in hand, or advance your landmarks 1 round.
flavor_text: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean

name: Ricochet
text:
Reputation: I cost 3 less. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
flavor_text: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir

name: Xer'sai Caller
text: Play: Predict.
flavor_text: Not all xer'sai are born to butcher. Some can summon their kin with piercing shrieks that rattle the sands as well as the senses.

name: Shaped Stone
text:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
flavor_text: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah

name: Scrying Sands
text:
Predict.
Give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavor_text: "I have seen my destiny, and this time, I will not be stopped." - Azir

name: Rock Hopper
text: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
flavor_text:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary

name: Preservationist
text: Play: Advance an allied landmark 3 rounds.
flavor_text: Whenever he seeks a moment's peace, Zilean returns to Icathia's last garden, just as he remembers it.

name: Vekauran Vagabond
text: When I'm summoned, summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 2 rounds.
flavor_text: Seeing Akshan hanging underneath the fourth-floor window, Najah cursed under her breath. Pretty boy beat her to the mark. Again. Turning her dagger over in her hand, she pondered what to say to him. Maybe this time, he'd finally acknowledge her.

name: Quicksand
text: Give an enemy -4|-0 or 2 enemies -1|-0 this round. Disable their positive keywords this round.
flavor_text: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.

name: Shifting Sands
text:
Deal 4 to a unit.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavor_text: "Go. Surround them. They cannot fight the land itself." - Azir

name: Arise!
text:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
flavor_text: "The order is given." - Azir

name: Inner Sanctum
text:
Reputation: I cost 3 less. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
flavor_text: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir

name: Profiteer
text: When I'm summoned, create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavor_text: "My friend, for you I've procured this incomparable beauty straight from the fabled Tomb of the Emperors and pulled it right from the hand of the great Renekton himself and as I rode out, I was surrounded by ten--twenty!--bloodthirsty sauren riders! Truly, a miracle that such a treasure has made it to your hands."

name: Sivir
flavor_text: Sivir made her way through life as a mercenary, and burdened herself with all the risks and rewards that came with her choice. One fateful expedition almost cost her everything, but as her blood seeped into Shurima's sands, it awoke an ancient power that would return both her and her homeland to greatness.

name: Inspiring Marshal
text: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
flavor_text: To receive the blessing of Azir is a great honor - to give a blessing in his name, an honor greater still.

name: Merciless Hunter
text: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavor_text: "And... there. Tied up, nice 'n pretty. Renekton likes his meals delivered still-squirming."

name: Xerxa'Reth, The Undertitan
text: Attack: If I have 8+ Power, give me Fearsome, Overwhelm, and SpellShield this round.
flavor_text: "It is said that hundreds of years ago, the river Khaleek bore a great trading outpost known as Taraleek upon its shores.
